FuncDef: The reset nat user nat-ip-pool section command clears user information from an address segment in a global address pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes user information with a specified global address pool.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Deletes user information with a specified address segment in a global address pool.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset nat user nat-ip-pool pool1 section 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear user information from a specified address segment in a global address pool, run the reset nat user nat-ip-pool section command.
Precautions
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
